entry.title: Dovecote
entry.summary:
Author: KilldevilandtheWildThings

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,017Chapters: 1/12Kudos: 1

Summary: Buck held the little plastic bird close in front of his eyes, twisting it back and forth.‚ÄúYou can say it, Buck,‚Äù Eddie encouraged, quietly. ‚ÄúTo put it out there in‚Ä¶ the universe. And you‚Äôll see her tomorrow, anyway.‚Äù‚ÄúI think‚Ä¶‚Äù Buck took a huge breath, breathing deep into his chest, past the hurt, past the hard rock of anxiety that sat at its center, past the tears welling in his eyes; he aimed all of it back out, straight into the heart of the deep, deep universe.‚ÄúI think I met my daughter tonight.‚Äù¬†or;A work of fate or God or man or the universe crosses the paths of Buck and a small, green-eyed girl with a bird in her palm and the future in her snaggle-toothed grin. entry.title: I'm too clever (and then I'm too fucking dumb)
entry.summary:
Author: Tamystardust

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,848Chapters: 12/12Kudos: 199

Summary: ‚ÄúOkay then, we stop,‚Äù Buck said. Eddie started to open his mouth, frustration already back on his face but Buck shook his head. ‚ÄúFor now. Not permanently. But I kind of agree with Christopher on this one. It‚Äôs not just a matter of right place, but also right time. I agree- I agree with you about how we are living. Even if we had gotten the loan, we would still be as tight money-wise, and we would still be miserable.‚Äù‚ÄúAt least we‚Äôd be miserable in our dream home,‚Äù Eddie said, the fight leaving him.‚ÄúOur dream home is not an over-expensive house in Pasadena,‚Äù Buck replied with a tired smile.‚ÄúNo, I guess it‚Äôs not,‚Äù Eddie said, leaning to drop a soft kiss on Buck's lips. ‚ÄúSo we stop?‚Äù‚ÄúWe pause. For now.‚ÄùOr, Buck and Eddie face financial adversity. They do some banking too, and they love each other through it all. How romantic.(Fourth installment of the Messy series, can be read as a stand-alone, but it might make more sense to read the rest before!)

entry.title: Embers Between Us
entry.summary:
Author: Madforyou

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 77,773Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 447

Summary: The picture on the back is a dark tree line contrasted by the wide blue sky above it. ‚ÄòGEORGIA‚Äô is written in big white letters across the top, the bottom saying ‚ÄúWelcome to Adventure.‚Äù It‚Äôs faded, like it has taken one too many trips in the back of a mail truck, tattered and worn.Eddie flips it over, the back scrawled with quick but somewhat neat handwriting‚Äîsomething personal. Scanning the words his eyes drop to the corner‚Äîthe address.‚ÄòMaddie Kendall, 1500 Hemlock Ave, Hershey, PA 17033‚ÄôWhat the hell?Or,An AU where Buck's postcards, which he sent to Maddie, were forwarded to Eddie on deployment by mistake through a Military Outreach Program. They become a reason for Eddie to hold on through the dark times, becoming attached to the man behind the letters and his stories of his travels. Until, by a twist of fate, they bring him face to face with Buck himself.This AU is canon divergent. Some things change but some stay the same.

entry.title: One strike, two hearts
entry.summary:
Author: travic_mh

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,508Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 15

Summary: And so the paramedic runs around to the front of the ambulance, and soon, Bobby and Hen watch as the young firefighter disappears from view, not knowing if they‚Äôd ever see him alive again.The two stand there for a moment, the weight of the last ten minutes hanging down on them like a pile of bricks. It isn‚Äôt until Bobby feels a sense of something missing that he breaks out of his trance once again, and turns toward Hen.‚ÄúWhere‚Äôs Eddie?‚ÄùHen stares at him in horror as she, too, realizes that they hadn‚Äôt seen the man since before the lightning strike.‚ÄúOh my god,‚Äù she says exasperated. ‚ÄúYou don‚Äôt think-‚Äù‚ÄúCap!‚Äù Ravi cuts Hen off as he runs around the firetruck toward Bobby and her.They watch with concerned faces as the kid makes it all the way over to them.‚ÄúIt‚Äôs Eddie. He got hit too.‚Äù‚Ä¶Buck and Eddie‚Äôs hearts become intertwined after being struck by the same bolt of lightning, because there‚Äôs no way Eddie didn‚Äôt get hurt after being flung off of that truck. My spin on 6x10, with recovery too.
